message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1500000, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its importance to us, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1200000. This represents a substantial saving for you, considering its worth to you is estimated at $1000000. We believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
